webBgTitle.message: Set the site background (up to 5 selected)

uploadImageTip.message: Image specifications: png, bmp, jpg, jpeg, gif; size: <=5M; size: not less than 1920*1080px (when the image you upload does not reach the recommended size, we will display it in the center of the page according to the original size of the uploaded image ).

uploadImageOrder.message: When you upload more than one image, it appears in the order in which it was uploaded.

linkTip.message: Description: Up to 10 link addresses can be added, link names can be up to 10 words, drag to reorder.

linkFormatPlaceholder.message: Please enter it as the format http://www.ulearning.cn.

resetConfirm.message: When you restore the default style, the custom style will be cleared, are you sure you want to restore it?

badgeTip.message: Formats: png, bmp, jpg, gif; Size: up to 2 MB; Suggested width x height: 120x120 px

editFriendLink.description: 点击底部编辑页脚的按钮，会弹出一个弹框，弹框的标题
